alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 8:27PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Rainfall from last weekend and backwater from the Ohio river has caused flooding on the Green River. The water level at Paradise has dropped below the moderate flood level. Minor flooding is now occurring and will continue well into next week. For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 380.0 feet, Water rises over the skimmer wall at the TVA fossil plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 385.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Saturday evening and then rise back above flood stage Monday morning. The river will crest again around 380.6 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
